name: - INDULGE - Egyptian Musk & Bergamot Organic Sugar Scrub -- 16 oz.
description:
-- Ingredients: Organic Turbinado Sugar, Organic Shea Butter, Grapeseed Oil, Organic Avocado Oil, Egyptian Musk Fragrance, Bergamot Essential Oil

-- Usage: Use scrub to gently exfoliate skin. Rinse clean with warm water and then massage in oils left on skin for a soft, silky finish.

-- Benefits: Sugar scrubs are the perfect way of getting rid of dry, flaky skin, while shea butter and the oils give it a smooth appearance. 

Egyptian Musk fragrance is defined by a soft, sensual aroma that delights the senses of the wearer. Bergamot essential oils encourage the release of pent-up feelings and help us rediscover spontaneity and optimism.

** Notice : Contains materials derived from tree nuts (Shea and/or Coconut) -- do not use if allergic **

Price does not include shipping

name: - INDULGE - Egyptian Musk & Bergamot Raw Honey and Organic Milk Soak -- 32 oz.
description:
-- Ingredients: Organic Powdered Milk, Raw Honey Powder, Baking Soda, Tapioca Corn Starch, Egyptian Musk Fragrance, Bergamot Essential Oil

-- Usage: Pour a half/full cup of the milk and honey soak into a hot bath, letting the ingredients lather over the skin and rejuvenate the body.

-- Benefits: Milk and raw honey makes your skin soft and supple. The lactic acid in milk is exfoliating, and honey is softening, moisturizing, and all-around beautifying. 

Egyptian Musk fragrance is defined by a soft, sensual aroma that delights the senses of the wearer. Bergamot essential oils encourage the release of pent-up feelings and help us rediscover spontaneity and optimism.

** Settling may occur during shipping **

Price does not include shipping

name: - RELIEVE - Lemon & Eucalyptus Organic Mineral Bath -- 19 oz.
description:
-- Ingredients: Espom Salts (Magnesium Sulfate), Pink Himalayan Salt, Baking Soda, Tapioca Corn Starch, Lemon-Eucalyptus Essential Oil

-- Usage: Pour a half/full cup of the salts into a hot bath and let your body soak in it for a minimum of 12 minutes (as recommended).

-- Benefits: Epsom salts and Pink Himalayan Salts are well-known to condition the skin, relieve stress/sore muscles and raise energy levels. 

Lemon essential oils treat stress disorders, insomnia, and tiredness. Eucalyptus essential oils reduce headaches and mental exhaustion while also cleansing the air.

Price does not include shipping

name: - INDULGE - Egyptian Musk & Bergamot Organic Whipped Body Oil -- 6 oz.
description:
-- Ingredients: Organic Shea Butter, Organic Avocado Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Egyptian Musk Fragrance, Bergamot Essential Oil

-- Usage: Apply our Whipped Body Oil to your entire body, especially dry areas. Allow time for the oil to soak in, leaving your skin silky and rejuvenated.

-- Benefits: Our mixture of organic shea butter, grapeseed and coconut oils deeply moisturize the skin, making it more supple. 

Egyptian Musk fragrance is defined by a soft, sensual aroma that delights the senses of the wearer. Bergamot essential oils encourage the release of pent-up feelings and help us rediscover spontaneity and optimism.
